title: Tech News: The Rise of the Robocall
itunes:title: Tech News: The Rise of the Robocall
description:
Facebook is making a smartwatch, Google isn't welcome in French hotels and robocalls have changed how Americans answer (or don't answer) the phone. Plus more in tech news!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
